PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06812024-06-12PS
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of JOANNE BLANCHARD of Mount Royal, Quebec, a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada and her designation as Chairperson of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on May 28, 2029, effective June 22, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of JOANNE BLANCHARD of Mount Royal, Quebec, a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada and her designation as Chairperson of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on May 28, 2029, effective June 22, 2024.
